tool_description: This is an API that searches news about climate change from various sources written in Spanish plus their images!
name: Noticias Sobre Cambio Climatico
title: Noticias Sobre Cambio Climatico

api_list.name: Get Individual Newspaper Source (Latam)
api_list.description: Gets all the news from a specific newspaper about climate change
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://noticias-sobre-cambio-climatico.p.rapidapi.com/news/infobae"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "noticias-sobre-cambio-climatico.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://noticias-sobre-cambio-climatico.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "noticias-sobre-cambio-climatico.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Climate Change News in Spanish (Latam)
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news in spanish about climate change  from news outlets of Latin America.
api_list.code:

url = "https://noticias-sobre-cambio-climatico.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "noticias-sobre-cambio-climatico.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
